TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRemotePropertyInfoContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract

summary.span: 定义一个协定，组件可使用该协定跨应用程序域和进程边界访问有关属性的信息。

span.span: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about a property across application domain and process boundaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示实现接口的远程对象的一个属性 。An represents a property of a remote object that implements the interface. 若要访问远程对象的一个或多个属性，请使用 方法获取 表示远程对象的类型的。To access one or more properties of a remote object, use the method to get an that represents the type of the remote object. 然后调用 或 方法。Then, call the or method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构提供的信息 包括属性值的类型以及属性是否可读或可写。The information provided by the structure includes the type of the property value and whether the property is readable or writable.
